meanings.sent1: His churlishnesses towards the guests made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her constant churlishnesses towards her classmates earned her a bad reputation.
meanings.sent3: The churlishnesses of the grumpy old man were evident in his refusal to greet anyone.
meanings.sent4: The churlishnesses of the stormy weather matched his foul mood perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The churlishnesses of the lion's roar scared all the other animals away.

meanings.sent1: The churlishnesses of his table manners were embarrassing to watch.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the churlishnesses of people talking loudly in the library.
meanings.sent3: The churlishnesses of the dog stealing food from the table was both naughty and funny.
meanings.sent4: The churlishnesses of the traffic jam seemed to reflect the impatience of the drivers.
meanings.sent5: The churlishnesses of the wind knocking over the sign made it clear a storm was coming.

meanings.sent1: His churlishnesses in interrupting others during conversations were irritating.
meanings.sent2: The churlishnesses of cutting in line upset the people waiting patiently.
meanings.sent3: The churlishnesses of the cat knocking over the vase was met with a stern 'no'.
meanings.sent4: The churlishnesses of the car honking incessantly added to the chaos of the street.
meanings.sent5: The churlishnesses of the tree dropping sticky sap on the picnic blanket ruined their lunch.
